title: iOS Developer at BrightHR
description: Improving BrightHR"s iOS applications with implementing new features in SwiftUI, converting legacy code from UIKit to SwiftUI, general maintenance and deduplication, and writing unit tests, UI tests and Snapshot Tests.
list: Implementing new HR related features as part of the main feature team"s work
Adding unit tests, UI tests and Snapshot tests to increase test coverage
Improving current UI standardisation with custom extensions, and small general purpose components with high customisation flexibility
Fixing UI bugs as found on smaller devices
Frequent incremental releases to improve the user experience

title: Junior Software Developer / Junior Digital Designer at Twelve Oaks Software
description: Creating bespoke software and providing expertise in graphic and user experience design. Continuing our primary focus on high quality and context appropriate software (web app, mobile & desktop app, website), and transcending modern aesthetics into usability, whilst creating unique design language tailored to each client.
list: Created a sport statistics display iOS app with Swift and SwiftUI for a client, target for iOS 14+
UX Design and programmed the initial setup for an in house application on Android with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, target for Android 6.0+
